mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.title, m.`year`, f.rating FROM favorites f INNER JOIN movies m ON m.id = f.movie_id WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorites (user_id, movie_id, rating) VALUES (#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{rating});
mapper.update: UPDATE favorites SET rating = #{rating} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND movie_id = #{movieId};
UPDATE favorites SET rating = NULL WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND movie_id = #{movieId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorites WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND user_id = #{userId};
